thread.title: Donald Trump on Barack Obama: ‘He likes me’ - National | Globalnews.ca
thread.title_full: Donald Trump on Barack Obama: ‘He likes me’ - National | Globalnews.ca

author: Jesse Ferreras
title: Donald Trump on Barack Obama: ‘He likes me’ - National | Globalnews.ca
text:
“And then we hop into the car and we drive down Pennsylvania Avenue together, we don’t even talk about it. Politics is amazing.” 
But Obama wasn’t the sole subject that O’Reilly and Trump covered in their interview. 
They also talked about Russian President Vladimir Putin. O’Reilly called Putin a “killer” at one point. 
“What do you think? Our country’s so innocent?” Trump responded. 
The U.S. president then explained the respect he has for Putin. 
“I respect a lot people but that doesn’t mean I’m going to get along with him,” he said. 
“He’s a leader of his country. I say it’s better to get along with Russia than not. And if Russia helps us in the fight against ISIS, which is a major fight, and Islamic terrorism all over the world – that’s a good thing.” © 2017 Global News, a division of Corus Entertainment Inc.
